companies.name: Amazon Inc
companies.description: Amazon.com is a vast Internet-based enterprise that sells books, music, movies, housewares, electronics, toys, and many other goods, either directly or as the middleman between other retailers and Amazon.coms millions of customers.

job-offers.description: We search for a frontend developer to join our company. REQUIREMENTS: react, bootstrap-vue and angular
We search for a Software junior developer to join our company. REQUIREMENTS: Degree in computer science and some experience developing software

We search for an undergruate student to join our company. 
 REQUIREMENTS: Degree in computer science, mathematics or similars. Eager to learn new things.

companies.name: Google
companies.description: A problem is not truly solved until it is solved for all. Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. Bring your insight, imagination and a healthy disregard for the impossible. Bring everything that makes you unique. Together, we can build for everyone.

job-offers.description:
Be a local sovereignty advocate on technical topics and the local field interface to engineering teams. 
 REQUIREMENTS: Experience as a security sales engineer in a cloud computing environment, or in a customer/partner-facing role.

Join us for a 12-14 week paid internship that offers personal and professional development, an executive speaker series, and community-building. The Software Engineering Internship program will give you an opportunity to work on complex computer science solutions, develop scalable, distributed software systems, and also collaborate on multitudes of smaller projects that have universal appeal. 
 REQUIREMENTS: Pursuing a Masters degree program or post secondary or training experience with a focus on subjects in software development or other technical related field.

The Student Researcher Programs primary objective is to foster academic collaborations with students through research at Google. Join us for a paid Student Researcher position that offers the opportunity to work directly with Google research scientists and engineers on cutting-edge research projects. REQUIREMENTS: Currently pursuing a Bachelors, Masters, or PhD degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Math or related technical field.

companies.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
companies.description: In 1939, Bill Hewlett and Dave Packard, college friends turned business partners, started the original Silicon Valley startup in the space of a rented Palo Alto garage. Starting with audio oscillators, the friends built the foundation for a company that would grow to become a global leader in enterprise technology.

job-offers.description:
Our AI & Data Practice brings a unique mix of skills (AI/ML, data science, data platforms, data infrastructure, MLOps, data engineering, high-performance compute, AI/data infrastructure partner technologies) and expertise of over 20 years to help our customers accelerate innovation and unlock insights through data transformation services and adoption of artificial intelligence technologies. We are recognized as a global leader in AI IT Services 
 REQUIREMENTS: You are a student still enrolled in the University pursuing Bachelors/Мasters degree in computer science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, or related areas of study.

We are looking for a talented individual with problem solving skills and a genuine curiosity for technology to join our QA team with the goal of validating the health of software features. The intern will be responsible for automation of test procedures and processes. The internship is a remote work environment. 
 REQUIREMENTS: Enrolled in an accredited Bachelors degree program in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Engineering

In this internship you will be working as part of a world-class ASIC design team at HPE developing the next generation Slingshot interconnect used in large exascale high performance computer.
 REQUIREMENTS: Candidate is pursuing a Masters degree or PhD in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or related field
